note: subject identifier used by dbGaP (if available)
short name for study as defined by CC
flag if subject has been submitted to dbGaP
sample identifier used by dbGaP (if available)
age of subject when sample was collected
processing batch for sample (e.g. genotyping plate)
file name (base name, no path separators)
name of array manufacturer (e.g. Illumina, Affymetrix)
software and version used for genotype calling (e.g. GenomeStudio v2.0.5)
if source data is in PRIMED, provide dataset_id
source of input data (e.g. array name, WES, targeted sequencing)
software and version used for imputation (e.g. IMPUTE2 v2.3.2)
description of quality filter applied to data (e.g. info > 0.9)
type of sequencing assay performed (e.g. WGS, WES)
name of capture region bed file (if applicable)
sequencing platform used (e.g. Illumina HiSeq X)
average target size for DNA fragments
